  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 itemprop="name" class="text-center medium-text-left">Goddess Burberry <small style='white-space: nowrap'>for women</small></h1></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="83483" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="83483" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.22</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="6338">6,338</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1150"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Goddess</b> by <b>Burberry</b> is a Aromatic fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. <b>Goddess</b> was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Amandine Clerc-Marie. Top notes are Vanilla, Lavender, Cacao and Ginger; middle note is Vanilla Caviar; base note is Vanilla Absolute. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Fragrance has always been a great love of mine, and I am fascinated with the power that scent can have and the way it can immediately transport you to a specific time and place in your life. Being allowed to become an ambassador for the new Burberry fragrance feels particularly special and personal.</p>

<p>To me, lionesses represent female unity and strength. They are confident and move together. Much like them, we stand on the shoulders of the women who came before us and those who bolster us throughout our own lives. To me, this image is a real source of empowerment. - Emma Mackey, Burberry Beauty Ambassador</p>

<p>Burberry unveils the new Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum, a unique aromatic fragrance for women. The launch is supported by a campaign featuring British-French actress and new ambassador for Burberry Beauty, Emma Mackey.</p>

<p>The campaign presents a story of self-discovery inspired by the collective strength and power of the pride of lionesses. Created with live footage of lionesses in their natural environment and the latest CGI technology, Burberry creates an imaginary world where Emma Mackey and the pride come together as one.</p>

<p>Embodying the spirit of the Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum, Emma channels the strength of the pride, igniting the power within to discover her inner confidence and ascend the peak ahead of her. Echoing Shygirl in the overlaid vocals, one of me, but Im not the only one, we are many burning like the sun, the lionesses represent the collective power of female strength and support and the fact that together, we can all discover our inner goddess and achieve the extraordinary.</p>

<p>A unique gourmand aromatic fragrance led by a powerful trio of distinct vanillas. Collected by hand, the beans dry in the sun for five to seven weeks. They are then stored in wooden boxes to mature and develop their sweet signature aroma.</p>

<p>My initial goal for Burberry Goddess was to expand upon the common use of vanilla to deliver a new kind of rich olfactive experience. For this purpose, I used three distinct types of vanilla extraction. The first is a vanilla infusion, which provides the brightest, woody vanilla possible. Then I used <em>Firgood</em> , also known as vanilla caviar, for the first time in a fragrance. This innovative new ingredient adds a sweet, rich, and animalic vanilla. Lastly, vanilla absolute is darker and richer, enhancing the fragrance with a mysterious, milky aspect." - Amandine Clerc-Marie, Master Perfumer.</p>

<p>During the process of creating the perfect vanilla accord, the precious vanilla was wrapped with notes of bright Lavender Diva essence from Provence and earthy notes of cocoa and ginger roots, creating an aromatic balance to each vanilla.</p>



<p><strong>Olfactive Pyramid</strong></p>

<p><strong>Top: Vanilla Infusion and Lavender</strong></p>

<p><strong>Heart: Vanilla Caviar</strong></p>

<p><strong>Base: Vanilla Absolute</strong></p>

<p><strong>Family: Gourmand Aromatic</strong><br />
</p>

<p>Marking Burberrys first-ever refillable fragrance, the bottle boasts an elegant design. The gabardine-inspired gold label on the outer casing references Burberrys long-standing heritage, whilst the archive-inspired bottle is modernized with a gold medallion.</p>

<p>Burberry Goddess is available<br />
in 10 ml, 30 ml, 50 ml, and 100 ml bottles.</p>

<p>Burberry Goddess Shower Gel,<br />
Body Lotion and Refill (150ml) complete the collection.</p>

Belle</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.62615.jpg"alt="Angels' Share By Kilian" <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem;     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2372049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2372049" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frgrncxgrl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frgrncxgrl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2372049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2372049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448182">Frgrncxgrl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733433549" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I call this a luminous gourmand. Its a comforting, glimmering dynamic vanilla. It takes you on a pleasant journey and settles into a true, pure vanilla. I get a lot of citrusy ginger and aromatic lavender with a bit of vanilla with the initial spray. The heart is so rich and warm, I either go nose blind to it or it truly doesnt travel to the heart of the fragrance, but I get no lavender beyond the initial spray. Theres still a bit of zest from the ginger. I get no cacao whatsoever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2372049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2372049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2372044" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I am glad people are downvoting it, I do not understand how this is wearable...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2372044"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2372044#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156">Afc_Croatian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733408443" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am pleased to see that this is voted so far as the best women's fragrance release of 2024, what a lovely sweet mix of an opening this has.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2371612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2371612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371404" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371404" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lenkusia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1891538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1891538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lenkusia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371404ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371404" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1891538">lenkusia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733388367" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>its so warm (ginger) and cozy (vanilla) and relaxing (lavender). in general i think im a sucker for lavender in more feminine leaning perfumes. here its a tiny tiny note, i dont think i would recognise it that easily but it adds to the whole thing. and its so versatile! i can imagine it working any season, any occasion. i loooooove, i need to get it for christmas &lt;3!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2371404"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2371404#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371336" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PerfumeLights"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1037549"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1037549.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PerfumeLights" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1037549">PerfumeLights</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733379915" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me so much of Amor Amor by Cacharel. It came out ages ago (maybe early 2000s). I wore Goddess two days ago and I couldnt remember what it reminded me until it hit me and I ran home to test them side by side. They are not 100% dupes, but the vibe and feel are SO SIMILAR. I find it more similar to this one than the Guerlain one listed here. Amor Amor opens with a zing of something a little bit more fresh, maybe citrusy, but the FEEL of the over all fragrance and dry down are very similar to my nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2371336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2371336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2371152" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371152" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lauradahlman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2328085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lauradahlman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371152ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371152" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2328085">lauradahlman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733362845" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The initial spray is so warm and spicy, likely from the ginger. For some reason, it makes me think of amber, even though theres none listed in the notes. Maybe its the warmth, which almost leans toward the scent of hot, burnt sugar at first. The opening is actually a bit unpleasant to me, but once it dries down, I quite like it. Theres a subtle hint of lavender and ginger with lots of warm vanilla. It does fade down to just vanilla after a while. Its not terribly complex, but sometimes something simple can be enjoyable. It's so warm definitely not a summer scent in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2371152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2371152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/524">dovey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733356832" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lavender notes ruined it<br />
Smells better on card than on skin </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2371064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2371064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369781" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kathmarieandrews"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kathmarieandrews" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Beauty-8840.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8840.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beauty"title="Beauty"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549206">kathmarieandrews</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733268592" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Goddess a strong like not a love for me. A cozy chill at home or bed scent so relaxing . Must be the lavender. If I was gifted this I would be pleased.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2369781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2369781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369319" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YourFragranceFriend"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1619170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YourFragranceFriend" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619170">YourFragranceFriend</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 08:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicious vanilla. Creamy yet powdery. Smells so familiar yet I cant place it. The vanilla reminds me of the vanilla in Mugler Goddess but this strays from the beachy coconut and goes to almost a salty slight lavender edge. Its more similar to the warm, comforting creamy ginger of a fragrance like Jo Malone Ginger Biscuit than the bright and sharp vanilla lavender of YSL Libre.<br />
<br />
 This sits very close to the skin as vanillas tend to do, so I recommend over spraying. <br />
<br />
This smells really good but isnt making me fall in love with it. I see this as your dumb reach inoffensive cozy scent. Its so simple Im struggling to have much to say about this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2369319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2369319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368171" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hgxoxxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1839995"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1839995.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hgxoxxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-Coral-Fantasy-71760.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71760.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma Coral Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368171ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368171" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1839995">hgxoxxo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 08:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fragrance. Classy and elegant without bordering on the classy and elegant old lady. I wont say it smells rich and luxurious but its close. And thats not a bad thing. The perfect warm and decadent fragrance for a young woman. While there arent any citrus notes, it is very citrusy to me, especially the opening which could be coming from the lavender and ginger. Its pretty light for a warm perfume and that lightness translates into the perfume not lasting as long as I would hope for. After 2ish hours the smell just sort of disappears from my skin. I personally feel this can be worm all year round, day and night. Smells amazing and my mom loves it.<br />
<br />
Overall: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2368171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2368171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367950" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366574" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eliabra222"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335095"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="eliabra222" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Gris-Charnel-57038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Charnel"title="Gris Charnel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366574ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366574" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335095">eliabra222</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 18:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Light vanilla with lavender, not too sweet and also not too floral, sits close to the skin and has a great dry down. May lean slightly on the sweeter side of what I would usually prefer, but overall a great scent wearable for almost any occasion. This one is currently in my top 10!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2366574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2366574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366259" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366259" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="T0nka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2256260"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2256260.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="T0nka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ojar/Halwa-Kiss-Eau-de-Parfum-77823.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77823.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halwa Kiss Eau de Parfum"title="Halwa Kiss Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366259ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366259" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2256260">T0nka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 13:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft creamy vanilla and lavender are harmoniously balanced to create something feminine, elegant, expensive and versatile. A capable women who is effortless chic wears this. This perfume tells a story of purpose, a career women who is ambitious, loves to travels, having dinners in the city and but also enjoys a good book on a lazy rainy Sunday. An infusion of feminity, ambition, passion and intent. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2366259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2366259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2366174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2366174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365954" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fairyfer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1811132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1811132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fairyfer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1811132">Fairyfer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good one. Love it. This style of perfume has a tendency to become a hype or a very common scent as happened with Good Girl or Black Opium. However, I really like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2365954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2365954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365881" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365881" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ziya_222"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2287694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2287694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ziya_222" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365881ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365881" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2287694">ziya_222</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 05:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a good vanilla, the initial spray isn't great but the dry down is to DIE FOR. Sprayed literally 3 sprays on my shirt, and I could still smell it 2 days later. Hands down the best vanilla I have tried!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2365881"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2365881#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365815" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365815" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SophiaViolette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677133"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1677133.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SophiaViolette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365815ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365815" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677133">SophiaViolette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 03:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first spray offers a beautiful, raw vanilla, with light fresh florals balancing the sweetness of the fragrance.<br />
But only after 20 minutes, the vanilla is redundant, clogging and nothing develops past it. Gets boring, powdery, lasts on skin and paper but weakly.<br />
The more I try it and smell it, the more it annoys and bores me.<br />
<br />
Im also disappointed as the advertisement and the bottle presentation really made me want to try it, but it ended up not my cup of tea, and the fragrance is not groundbreaking nor as expected.<br />
Because of the presentation/name fragrance I would expect something animalistic, maybe a little peppery, smoky, balsamic-like.<br />
<br />
I also found that it doesnt follow Burberrys DNA  and after checking the perfumer, indeed there was a change made. This release is more like a Lancme or Armani release, reminds me also of Vanilla Orchide body shower gel from Yves Rocher I have.<br />
<br />
Overall this scent is more adequate for mature women than for young ladies  and yet it doesnt give this old money chicmodern woman that Burberry perfumes usually have.<br />
<br />
___<br />
<br />
Projection, sillage, longevity : 6/10<br />
Originality, presentation : 5,5/10<br />
Quality, value : 6,5/10<br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2365815"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2365815#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2365167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2365167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2365167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364298" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="malvieee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2340337"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2340337.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="malvieee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2340337">malvieee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh vanilla. The lavender note is VERY in your face at the opening, but soon it gets less aggressive revealing a creamy, spicy, chocolately vanilla. Lasts super long on clothes and the projection is okay. The lavender note can be toned down by layering it with VS Bare Vanilla or B&amp;BW Vanilla Bean Noel as it helps bring out the vanilla notes faster and stronger. A bit overpriced, but it doesn't feel cheap, just basic and generic. May be too mature for some? The bottle is gorgeous. Perfect for every occasion I feel like, just depends on how much you spray it and what you layer it with.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2364298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2364298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364180" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2364180"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2364180#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364130" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="d1lara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1348746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="d1lara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1348746">d1lara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells really good the lavender and vanilla are very well blended. Its not as vanilla heavy as I expected, I think the lavender is stronger and kind of overpowers the vanilla. Its still very nice I feel like sometimes lavender smells kinda dirty but this one doesnt. Its definitely not a gourmand vanilla. Its an inoffensive smell to me. Truly very good I have a travel spray and keep smelling it. Downside is it does not the longest around 3-4 hours on skin and around the same on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2364130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2364130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I'm getting it for Christmas </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2364095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2364095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2363980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2363241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2363241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362658" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2362658" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="transcendentbrutality"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2278572"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="transcendentbrutality" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Philosykos-Eau-de-Parfum-3865.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3865.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Philosykos Eau de Parfum"title="Philosykos Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2362658ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2362658" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2278572">transcendentbrutality</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-27">11/27/24 01:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>im not a huge fan of vanilla or lavender fragrances in general, but i LOVE vanilla lavender vapes, and have been craving a perfume that has the same cosy, comforting scent and vibe of my favourite bedtime treat. as basic and common as vanilla/lavender combinations are, youd think itd be easy to find something suitable in the drugstore aromatherapy aisle, but NO. i tried so many fragrances, but they were either too herbaceous and medicinal or too cloyingly gourmand.<br />
<br />
anyway, this is it. this is the one. the gold-standard bedtime perfume by which all others are measured. a perfectly-blended comfy cloud of creamy lavender milk tea sweetened with the tiniest hint of honey. id never wear her during the day because shes a literal snoozefest. like a Pavlovian response, she makes my eyelids heavy.<br />
<br />
shes paradoxically basic as hell, but very special at the same time. a ubiquitously stereotypical masterpiece; the Mona Lisa of fragrances.<br />
<br />
(strangely, i cannot stomach Goddess Intense. i absolutely adore patchouli, and favour heavier, more full-bodied scents in general . . . but BGI is so foul and putrid to me! literal burnt plastic, in the worst possible way.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2362658"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2362658#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2362515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Gris Goddess </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2362515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2362515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361937" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361937" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penemex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2282379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2282379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="penemex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361937ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361937" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2282379">penemex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is amazing. The combination of vanilla, lavender and ginger is addictive. It's not overly sweet and the ginger gives it a fresh note - a slight peachy touch. Drydown is a nice slightly smoky vanilla.<br />
I bought this for my wife, but I see it as unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2361937"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2361937#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361661" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361661" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="peachpetals"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2333988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="peachpetals" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361661ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361661" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2333988">peachpetals</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 04:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a addictive perfume. At first sniff it is a very simple vanilla heavy with a  lavender core scent. And it is not a sickly sweet gourmaud vanilla dominating the market right now where you will smell like a cake, this is a grown up vanilla. I was not very impressed at first. However I kept picking up my sample, again and again and dosing myself in it. It has a cosy addictive quality to it that you want to keep smelling. Which it lasted longer though - I struggle to get more than 3 hours. However, the scent is so nice I still love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2361661"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2361661#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361171" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Toasty-shmoes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687570"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1687570.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Toasty-shmoes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Mango-Skin-49305.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49305.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mango Skin"title="Mango Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361171ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361171" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687570">Toasty-shmoes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 16:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Traditionally, I dislike lavender as a note, but Burberry Goddess was absolutely love at first sniff!  To my nose, she smells like a sweeter, vanillac Glossier You for the first hour or so, then dries down to a much quieter, cacao-leaning version of Bianco Latte. Having said all of that, it still has its own unique DNA and I find myself very intrigued by this fragrance!<br />
<br />
Purchased a full bottle today! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2361171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2361171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noirpowdersugar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2330195"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noirpowdersugar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); But its still a good fragrance. Well blended.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2361019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2361019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361005" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361005" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragnant"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423550"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1423550.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragnant" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361005ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361005" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423550">Fragnant</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It first smells like A&amp;D diaper rash cream and then develops into this lavender tinged over sprayed with a generic, nameless vanilla perfume that youd find at Marshalls for $14. Yes, it reminds me of Tru Fragrance Vanilla Potion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2361005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2361005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360250" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="goblinsniffer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2330655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2330655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="goblinsniffer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360250ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360250" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2330655">goblinsniffer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 18:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this. I've been wearing it for about a year now and I'm still not tired of it. It is obviously very warm/sweet but the lavender and ginger notes really help cut the sweetness. It's not a sugary or sickly vanilla at all in my opinion. It's a great balance between the cooling ginger/lavender and the warm, deep vanilla. I love how it wears on skin (although the lasting power isn't AMAZING), and I also love how it lingers on my clothing. If you want it to last, I'd say spray it on both your skin and clothes. I also always get compliments on it. All. The. Time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2360250"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2360250#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359942" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2233626">bananamiik</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 14:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No vanilla at all just straight up perfume alcohol. If you like to smell like perfume alcohol you will love this. It's very intense, overpowering, and headache-inducing. No ginger either. Some small bits of lavender. It doesn't smell like anything tbh, and without being too harsh it gives "acts rich but isn't" vibes. I feel bad for saying that I'm sorry if it's mean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2358919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2358919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
