I was skeptical at first because I generally dislike lavender, but Im so glad that I took the plunge. The lavender is blended perfectly with the vanilla such that neither note overpowers the other. This fragrance garners constant complements and has become a frequent choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2358892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2358892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358270" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="addangel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1078102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="addangel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Yum-Boujee-Marshmallow-81-99254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"title="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078102">addangel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 22:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As someone who really enjoys lavender but feels so-so about vanilla, I was really disappointed the first time I tried this. I thought the vanilla was very sweet and overpowering, and it have me a headache.<br />
<br />
However, as the cold moths rolled in, I found myself reaching for it (especially when getting ready for bed). Its a warm, sugary, comforting scent. (No idea how that relates to goddesses though.) I do vastly prefer Mon Guerlain, but Im glad this one is also getting used and not just collecting dust on a shelf.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2358270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2358270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357873" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elfin Will"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676994.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elfin Will" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Bronze-Goddess-Nuit-71476.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71476.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bronze Goddess Nuit"title="Bronze Goddess Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357873ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357873" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676994">Elfin Will</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful scent for the lovers of Vanilla! but maybe.. too much vanilla? Because this is all I smell in the drydown. It's beautiful, don't get me wrong.. but I think it lacks complexity or sophistication. And I love the lavender note! It gives it a slight unisex vibe, without taking out the feminine aspect of it!<br />
<br />
7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2357873"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2357873#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356300" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lovely sandra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273505"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2273505.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lovely sandra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273505">lovely sandra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 05:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably is perfect for vanilla lovers, but for me this is just too much I sprayed it on my arm in shop and 5 days later I still smell it in my room<br />
<br />
Thats probably a good part for, again, real vanilla lovers. It lasts long, for sure.<br />
As a white flower, citrus, amber and oud lover, I literally hate this. I couldnt stand it and its the most sweet scent Ive ever smelled.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2356300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2356300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Warm but also clean, making it appropriate for any season. I don't pick up much lavender, not like the intense version which is almost entirely herbaceous lavender for me. And the ginger is there but not in a way that's overtly spicy. This beautiful one is perfectly balanced. It's like Goldilocks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2352482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2352482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554721">bellabooked</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 05:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So sweet but refined at the same time. The lavender and ginger, along with vanilla in each layer, makes it a unique vanilla. It can work for any season honestly, but you have to love vanilla. I honestly have not tried to layer this one with any other fragrances because I do not think it needs it. This leans more daytime to me, as I like something deeper for evening, but overall very solid and unlike any other perfume I've tried in a great way!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I get the most compliments when I wear this perfume and it lasts a good 8 hours on me, hands down my favourite gourmand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2351609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2351609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2350331" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="loutuseys"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1936774.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="loutuseys" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Good-Chemistry/Coffee-Cloud-83692.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83692.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coffee Cloud"title="Coffee Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2350331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2350331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); The initial spray spells 100% like Angham. However, after that Goddess changes a bit. It's just enough sweetness and mixed with the Lavender it's so wonderful. All the notes go so well together. I needed a break from gourmands and this was a good choice.My first review and first full sized purchase!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2350331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2350331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349922" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brownbarbie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2320598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2320598.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brownbarbie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2320598">brownbarbie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the beginning I get like 70% lavender and 20% vanilla, with a big dose of ginger over the top and a hint of cacao. It's a spicy vanilla, not a soft one, even in the dry down. As a matter of a fact, it's so spicy that I almost have trouble even recognizing the scent as '"vanilla" in the traditional sense of the word.<br />
Edit: this has got to be one of the longest lasting perfumes I've ever sprayed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2349922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2349922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349011" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Meowkinz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1760303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1760303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Meowkinz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Flower-by-Kenzo-72.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flower by Kenzo"title="Flower by Kenzo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349011ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349011" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); I understand why its such a popular fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2349011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2349011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348947" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lauravladelena"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1578966"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1578966.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lauravladelena" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1578966">lauravladelena</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I associate this perfume with the color gold, I visualize a woman with tan skin and caramel hair that's wearing a lot of jewelry and it's definitely a summer night ouside. I get a sexy almost balsamic vanilla with a subtle lavander. It's a warm inviting scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2348947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2348947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The longevity is just not there for me on skin - maybe 3-4 hours. Haven't been a fan of other Burberry fragrances I've tried but really like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2348708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2348708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very precious lavender vanilla perfume. This is what you wear when you're rushing to your daily duties and aren't thinking about your scent too much. Which isn't a bad thing! This perfume is beautiful!! Excellent daily driver.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2348137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2348137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347598" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melody Valentine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melody Valentine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732">Melody Valentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 09:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I thought I'd tried this in a shop the other day but it was definitely the intense version. Just got samples of them both today and I much prefer the intense one. This one is really light. Much brighter though with a lot of ginger in the opening. Dries down to a much sweeter vanilla with a bit of lavender. I don't get much cocao but I can smell it a little bit. I don't think it's like Mon Guerlain, the intense is more similar to Mon Guerlain Intense. It definitely doesn't smell like Devotion. This one reminds me more of the OG Libre. It's much more a perfumey vanilla than a gourmand vanilla. I'm not blown away by it up to now. It's nice enough though and I'd probably use it if I was gifted it. I think it'd be good for layering but I don't think I'd wear it on it's own or buy a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2347598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2347598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347565" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732">Melody Valentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 08:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My samples came today and it was DEFINITELY intense that I tried in Boots the other day. This is totally different. I can smell the ginger a lot here and it's much brighter. I'm not wowed by it at this point. It's just a perfumey smell with ginger and a bit of lavender. Hardly any vanilla. I'm totally confused by it. The intense is way better imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2347565"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2347565#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346633" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346633" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vixtani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2190649"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2190649.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vixtani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Philosophy/Fresh-Cream-17774.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17774.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Cream"title="Fresh Cream"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346633ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346633" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2190649">vixtani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Today I found out I'm sensitive to lavender. I was excited to try this perfume, as I was told it's the best vanilla! But I can't smell anything other than a very overpowering lavender. My mom was also extremely sensitive to the strong lavender and has to open the window. It's a powerful and lasting perfume, no respray needed. You have to enjoy lavender to enjoy Goddess.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2346633"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2346633#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346254" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346254" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chimidoro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7591"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.7591.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chimidoro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alaia-Paris/Alaia-Nude-47470.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47470.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alaa Nude"title="Alaa Nude"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346254ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346254" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7591">chimidoro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kinda like a more caramelised and salty Mon Guerlain. <br />
Given that I'm keen on that, I felt drawn to this.<br />
I can even smell the chocolate in the notes.  <br />
However, while Mon Guerlain smells like an actual perfume, this winds up smells like popcorn.  <br />
It dries down to, just that, only that, popcorn. <br />
 Buttery popcorn.  <br />
Surely not. <br />
Another scent that smells like popcorn?  <br />
For REAL?<br />
For real. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2346254"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2346254#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346077" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346077" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="krownofkrueger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206014"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2206014.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="krownofkrueger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346077ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346077" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206014">krownofkrueger</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 02:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright and light. Sweet but not overly so, the lavender (and ginger, I think) really keeps the vanilla in check, gives it a fresh and clean kind of vibe. The lavender is also what is most prominent on my skin, but the vanilla is what I can smell projecting off of me. After a few hours of wear this settles into a more linear, cosy vanilla scent. Still quite light and fresh, not dense at all.<br />
<br />
I thought this might be a bit too feminine for me, and there's still a part of me that thinks that maybe it doesn't suit me all that much, but I keep reaching for it. Very easy wearing and pleasant overall - a daytime fragrance suited for warmer weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2346077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2346077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346061" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346061" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fainiss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2319967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2319967.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fainiss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346061ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346061" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2319967">fainiss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 02:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hated this at first when I sprayed it on a testing strip - all I smelled was old coins but I tried it again on my skin and it smelt expensive and very lavender! Like the other reviews on this perfume, the initial scent is very sharp but it softens after a few minutes. And after a few hours, it transitioned to a gorgeous vanilla scent, so of course I had to purchase it. It's perfect to wear both day and night and is versatile for any season and occasion. If you are not an over-consumer and looking for just one perfume that can be worn anywhere and anytime, this is the one. It also lasts great on me - about 8-10 hours! Sillage is also quite good. I layer this with Vanilla 28 by Kayali and I have never smelled more beautiful. A very lovely scent that I recommend!<br />
<br />
Edit: I always found that this perfume smelled familiar to me and it just came to me now. Smelling it just from the bottle, it smells a bit like the One Direction 'Our Moment' perfume - the one with the pink crown  If you know, you know. Hopefully my review has helped you get an idea of what to expect!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2346061"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2346061#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its most likely the combination of lavender and ginger, too spicy, slightly citrusy/sour, heavy and deep for my liking. Dry down is, however, beautiful and softer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2345984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2345984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However this perfume just doesn't blow me away, just decent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2344040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2344040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343312" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rla5057"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2067026"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2067026.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rla5057" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2067026">rla5057</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens up with a little bit of a lavender and ginger kick, and dries down to a decadent, rich vanilla. Gorgeous scent, but with an eau de toilette performance. I spray this stuff like body spray because thats about the strength. Gorgeous but weak, but here I am with a full bottle anyway.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2343312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2343312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343261" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ziva99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898768.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ziva99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898768">Ziva99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect for autumn and winter. <br />
Very elegant and cozy perfume for mature women. <br />
Aromatic, spicy, warm, sweet and gourmand perfect balance so far. <br />
<br />
Aromatic (and a little medicinal) lavender and spicy ginger are followed warm cacao and sweet vanilla. I can detect all the pyramid. <br />
Lavender and ginger will disappear slowly after 1-2hours. Then cacao and vanilla stays warm and cozy way with a little smokiness for 3hours, after turns sweet vanilla for 5hours+. Longevity is crazy, 3push of sprays at evening then at morning I could still feel it close to skin. <br />
<br />
This is definitely aromatic gourmand scent. Even multiple vanilla listed on the pyramid, until the last note it is not sweet gourmand scent so need to understand it.<br />
Aromatic part of lavender can be medicinal and with ginger it smells like grandma, I can understand the below comments. If you dont like lavender I recommend to avoid this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2343261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2343261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343115" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LLilies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LLilies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343115ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343115" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); I get absolutely no vanilla whatsoever!! its boring and headache inducing. Disappointed because i really wanted to like this one :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2343115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2343115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341940" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341940" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fahgrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026995"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026995.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fahgrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341940ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341940" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026995">fahgrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 07:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love the top notes, very beautiful and sweet. However, the base notes are disappointing. It smells boring at the end of the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2341940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2341940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341309" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Then0seknows!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202081.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Then0seknows!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202081">Then0seknows!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 16:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume..which is surprising because I typically hate lavender. However, it blends really well with the vanilla to create a very sophisticated scent. This is one of those perfumes that is a crowd pleaser as well and safe to wear in most situations.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2341309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2341309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341291" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="banjeekundt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2216454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="banjeekundt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Baruti/Chai-29642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chai"title="Chai"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216454">banjeekundt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 15:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is interesting and not what I was expecting based on the notes.<br />
<br />
At first spray, it's a very sharp lavender scent with a bit of ginger adding some extra kick. The screechy lavender calms down and becomes much more manageable and pleasurable after about ten minutes. I was contemplating scrubbing it off but, once it died down, the lavender became so soothing and reminded me of the lotions that are stocked in nice hotels. <br />
<br />
After a few hours, the lavender backs down just a smidge and some of the vanilla notes begin to emerge. Not very sweet but it's there just enough to further soften the lavender. It remains this way for the rest of the wear until it's all but faded and you are left with a subtly sweet skin scent reminiscent of the lavender syrup used for lattes.<br />
<br />
I don't think I picked up on any of the cacao and I don't think I could detect much ginger beyond the initial spray. Overall, I like this perfume. It's not too complex notes-wise but there is some nuance in how they are balanced and express themselves. The longevity is also greatlasting at least 10 hours on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2341291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2341291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341195" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341195" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bebeck"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1425868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bebeck" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Sweet-Oriental-Dream-3768.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3768.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Oriental Dream"title="Sweet Oriental Dream"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341195ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341195" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425868">Bebeck</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 14:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminiscent of a ginger version of D&amp;G Devotion. Has the cakey quality and sweetness but balanced with an ever so slightly spicy ginger. <br />
I sampled both this and the intense flanker. This is sweeter, with greater longevity and projection. I would argue this is the intense! It lasts hours and I find it to be superior in that respect. A less complex and sweet or even intense option would be the flanker.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2341195"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2341195#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341040" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="myraaaaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="myraaaaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);
