padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301631" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eclater"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211749"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2211749.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eclater" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211749">eclater</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a lovely scent. Theres a reason it is so widely liked. <br />
<br />
Also I havent seen this said before, but this smells SO much like The Most Wanted Parfum from Azzaro!! Makes sense because they share almost the same notes, but wow I was hit with memories associated with TMW when I sprayed myself with Goddess lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2301631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2301631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300750" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eaudemarfum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2087447.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eaudemarfum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087447">eaudemarfum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 21:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Something about the transition from summer to fall has me reaching for this. The ginger keeps it sharp and bright during the warmer days and the lavender vanilla provides some softness for cooler days. It is a lovely simple perfume and the uncomplicated-ness of it all makes it easy to wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2300750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2300750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299102" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299102" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Totsi93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Totsi93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299102ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299102" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170310">Totsi93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 11:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this as a tester and got it for cheaper than the original price and was willing to take the risk because vanilla / gourmand is my favorite scent... at first spray I was confused, I liked it but I wasn't used to the lavender and ginger with vanilla... I put it aside for a month without wearing it... I just sprayed it now and omg I truly truly love this one! its such a cozy, calming, sweet vanilla with a hint of cacao and lavender and ginger only in the opening. it smells like a dense vanilla heavy perfume, I would not say its gourmand but its a sweet subtle vanilla that is nit cloying. 100% will buy again when its finished. <br />
<br />
Note: this have a chance to become my signature scent. I really recommend putting it aside if you didnt like I at first then try it again. do not give it away im telling you! put it aside then try it again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2299102"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2299102#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295512" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maiazo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1655063"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1655063.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maiazo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Profumum-Roma/Gioiosa-88999.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88999.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gioiosa"title="Gioiosa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295512ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295512" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1655063">Maiazo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 04:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First time i sprayed it i could only smell vanilla vanilla and a hint of lavender. But now i recognize that it starts with distinct lavender, which becomes round and creamy (but not cloying at all) together with the vanilla and cacao. At the same time the cacao, and maybe the ginger (?) gives it a bit of roughness which gives depth and stops it from becoming overly sweet. its a really really pretty perfume. Not a ground breaking new scent but it does what its meant to in the best way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2295512"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2295512#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293796" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alexabaczak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2256197"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="alexabaczak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Brit-819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Brit"title="Burberry Brit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2256197">alexabaczak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 11:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm newer to fragrances and writing this review for anyone else who is new and lost in what first perfume to get. <br />
<br />
This, I think, is a safe first perfume when you are training your nose to distinguish different notes. It's simple and there's not a whole lot going on. If you like more complex scents, this probably isn't the best perfume for you. But it's simple and pretty. Some reviewers refer to this as a weakness of the fragrance, but I respectfully disagree and think it's a strength. Not every fragrance needs to be complex. There's room for simple and sweet. <br />
<br />
I don't get any vanilla at the first spray, but there's a lovely lavender scent. As it's drying, I got more ginger and the vanilla started coming through. On me personally, it dries down to a pretty vanilla-lavender scent with a warm ginger overtone. It starts smelling more vanilla the longer I wear it.<br />
<br />
I'm probably going to reach for this perfume on days I'm in a hurry and don't want to think too much about my perfume decision before class/work. Especially during Fall and Winter.<br />
<br />
As a note, a PTSD trigger for me is the smell of lavender (although I don't react as badly as I used to). I was a little concerned because I actually got the travel size of this perfume on a whim and didn't realize lavender was a note until it was already shipped. This perfume mixes lavender with different notes so I can associate that smell with other things. It's quite healing for me. :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2293796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2293796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293582" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emblass"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2228126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2228126.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emblass" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-20139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk"title="Choco Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2228126">Emblass</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so beautiful. It's quite a simple scent, but, to me, it's absolute perfectioneverything I've ever wanted in a perfume. Sweet, grown-up vanilla, a bit spicy, and so so warm. My signature scent. I hope they never get rid of this/reformulate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2293582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2293582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293385" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drscolaris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1607455"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1607455.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="drscolaris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Le-Parfum-78427.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78427.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Le Parfum"title="Black Opium Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293385ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293385" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1607455">drscolaris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-24">09/24/24 05:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My lovely nighttime fragnance! Just vanilla, cacao and lavander ( i can smell so mild ginger and too but its so silent to mention it ) also smelling like Victoria's Secret Bare Vanilla but more long lasting, strong sillage and mature version. So about the sillage and longevity, 3-4 sprayed in morning around 10 am, then at late night i got complimented "wow you smelling so good" from 1.5 meter distance. People who likes complex perfumes may not like this one it is just vanilla and lavander. But it is good for layering and bed time scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2293385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2293385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293196" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MayaZgb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1718389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1718389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MayaZgb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One"title="The One"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1718389">MayaZgb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 23:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Same as Guerlain Mon Guerlain, after first spray I noticed that. On my skin does not last so long or project like other burberry perfumes I had. So in my opinion overpriced  and to big hype about this perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2293196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2293196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="curlycomedy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2014858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="curlycomedy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khamrah"title="Khamrah"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014858">curlycomedy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 17:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was excited to get this due to the hype. I wonder why I am not gaga for Burberry Goddess the way others seem to be. Am I missing notes they are picking up? I think the scent is fine. On the cold sniff of the cap I get musk (pencil shavings) and vanilla with depth (a bit of woodiness), and the sweetness that is not so sugary to qualify it as a gourmand. My limitation in perfumery as a novice sniffer is that when many notes are present they are hard for me to decipher. Like hearing everyone shouting at once and trying to pick out your friends voice that you would otherwise recognize. I think that is a sign that it is well-blended. It comes across sophisticated and pleasant. I dont remember much about the dry down which means it becomes a skin scent on me relatively quickly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2292979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2292979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292159" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="matchawife"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2091716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="matchawife" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091716">matchawife</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 02:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla, vanilla, vanilla- and the shadow of a lavender latte. On my skin, this dries down to a scent I can only describe as frothy and warm. The cacao is drowned by the vanilla but present enough to kiss the lavender and it blends quite nicely. It does not bring to mind lionesses or girlbosses despite its marketing. It is simple and it does simple well. Perfect for the plainest of Janes, and I like it. Though, it does not last long enough to justify the price, in my opinion. <br />
<br />
That being said, this fragrance brings me the most compliments out of all in my collection. It's been described to me as soothing and tastefully feminine. All in all, cozy and crowd pleasing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2292159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2292159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291823" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2291823" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LKV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LKV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Golden-Decade-Winter-84761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Golden Decade Winter"title="Golden Decade Winter"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2291823ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2291823" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2291399" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fairymeist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269119"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1269119.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fairymeist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2291399ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2291399" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269119">fairymeist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Two years later I decided to revisit this scent, I truly love it now, it is nothing mind blowing but it certainly does smell nice, upon first spray you get that aromatic and zingyness from the lavender and the ginger and then it settles into a feminine vanilla.<br />
 Sometimes I catch a whiff of cookie, like a ginger cookie smell. The only downside: its gone in like 20 minutes literally, so the price seems a bit much for such bad performance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2291399"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2291399#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I feel cozy when i wear it, it soothes me. I will definetly keep in my collection</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2290709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2290709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289750" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karlyy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928894"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1928894.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karlyy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clinique/Cocoa-Cashmere-53720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cocoa & Cashmere"title="Cocoa & Cashmere"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928894">karlyy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was excited to try this one since everyone is claiming this is the new "it" vanilla perfume but on my skin I mostly get lavender (an aromatic screechy type of lavender) and just a hint of vanilla. And I'm not the biggest fan of lavender. I wish it was sweeter or creamier, I love vanilla and cacao so I was hoping I'd like this. It's mostly a mature lavender perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2289750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2289750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I am one of the few people who h.a.t.e.s this. I don't get the hype. To me it smells medicinal. I tried it on paper, on skin, on different seasons. It just smells bad and made me cough. For me it is a Noooooooooooooooooooooooo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2289522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2289522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It gets after 6 h buttery like a sweet vanilla biscuit. I love it in fall, winter or evenings. I love it for holidays season. I cannot wear it every day but I keep it for special ocasions. Lovely</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2289197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2289197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288990" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cokette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334767"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1334767.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cokette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288990ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288990" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334767">cokette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 03:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful pairing of lavender and vanilla - heavy emphasis on the vanilla. You can't really go wrong with a perfume like this. While simple in the notes, the scent itself feels extremely well layered. The projection too is wonderful.<br />
<br />
I always get complimented on this one, and so it has become a casual staple in my fragrance rotation. Burberry seems to just always get it right.<br />
<br />
Safe blind buy, and I would say it's also a great gifting option because of its mass appeal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2288990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2288990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's a very basic scent: sweet vanilla with a hint of lavender. It's a pleasant scent but I wouldn't wear this in warm seasons since it's sweetness can be overwhelming. I hadn't done research before buying this so I found the longevity and sillage very disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2288984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2288984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2287180"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2287180#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286506" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nocciola23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1466858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nocciola23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-55997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286506ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286506" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466858">Nocciola23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 21:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Originally I found this scent boring. It's vanilla on vanilla on vanilla. I love vanilla but...I thought this was a bit of a piss-take. Then, after a few wears, I picked up on its nuances. It has a musky, floral undertone to it that is comforting without being gourmand or wintery.<br />
I now find myself craving it and I'm wearing it more often than not.<br />
<br />
I just want to comment on the 'smell alikes' section here because Mon Guerlain is listed as the number 1 similarity. I have to disagree with this (as have many others). Mon Guerlain is a gorgeous scent, one of my all time faves, but it doesn't smell like Goddess.<br />
Yes, they share notes of vanilla and lavender, but Goddess is much lighter and muskier floral. MG is darker and sultrier. Definitely do not discount this perfume as a copy of MG, it is a stand alone scent that is worth trying a decant of so you can appreciate it over time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2286506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2286506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286133" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cerenityyy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309718"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309718.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cerenityyy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286133ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286133" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309718">Cerenityyy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an easy yes for me, as with probably a lot of others. After about an hour of running all around Sephora trying to find a perfume to spend my gift card on, I chose this. The only reason it took me a while to decide on it is because of how simple it is. But undeniably beautiful. And I've come to appreciate that there is beauty in simplicity too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2286133"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2286133#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285621" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aniton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1655707"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1655707.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aniton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Aoud-Cafe-18044.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18044.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aoud Caf"title="Aoud Caf"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285621ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285621" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1655707">aniton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 04:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a crowd pleaser! This perfume is like a good pop song - uncomplicated, feel good, addictive. It's super vanilla in my opinion, with just a hint of lavender, nothing too serious, just so it doesn't smell too juvenile. Very versatile and hits the right spot between a gourmand and non-gourmand vanilla fragrance. I think this would be a no brainer reach in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2285621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2285621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284271" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andie33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250971"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1250971.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andie33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284271ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284271" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250971">Andie33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 00:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sooo in love with this scent! The opening is interesting, there's something vaguely fruity cutting through the deep vanilla sweetness, but the drydown smells like cookies on my skin  <br />
<br />
Suitable for all weather and all circumstances! Work, dates, staying at home, going out at night, grabbing a coffee with a friend, literally any time and any place. It's not too casual nor too formal, it's not too much of anything.<br />
It's just a great smelling perfume that can be enjoyed by anyone and everyone<br />
<br />
Unfortunately, I need to overspray this one, and I feel like it goes from projecting quite decently, to sticking close to the skin really quickly. Still, this is a big big love </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2284271"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2284271#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2283838" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melo-D"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1826569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melo-D" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Liam-85097.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85097.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Liam"title="Liam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2283838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2283838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826569">Melo-D</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 12:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Intense, spicy, slightly sweet smooth vanilla.<br />
Love it, but its got very little longevity. <br />
All ginger, with some lavender. Not getting much, if any of the strong vanilla, cacao or sweetness. Too expensive for what it is. <br />
100% JPG LaBelle is the better choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2283838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2283838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282496" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MinaWaldorf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2242061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2242061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MinaWaldorf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Hypnotic-Poison-Eau-de-Parfum-23098.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23098.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Poison Eau de Parfum"title="Hypnotic Poison Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282496ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282496" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2282496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2282496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282332" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KatherineTs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674535"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1674535.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KatherineTs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674535">KatherineTs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 04:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oooo beautiful scent! I agree with a majority of comments here, that it's not unique and you can find similar scents on the market. Dominant gourmand sweetness of vanilla, with a hint of lavender which I don't feel much on my skin. It's more intense at the beginning, soon dries down to airy sweetness that's just gorgeous!<br />
I wasn't a fan of vanilla and my first vanilla perfume was zadig and voltaire's this is her, and now this is becoming my new fav one! I got a small sample and definitely going to buy it for this cold season!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2282332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2282332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281720" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="la_belle_duchesse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697407"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1697407.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="la_belle_duchesse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Very-Good-Girl-65560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Very Good Girl"title="Very Good Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697407">la_belle_duchesse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I must admit this perfume has really grown on me. I have the travel-size bottle and at first, I thought it was just okay, a nice pick-me-up scent but nothing really special. But during the summer I found myself wearing this often and now I love it. It is a nice blend of vanilla and lavender, those two notes are the ones I most pick up. The vanilla adds a pleasant, but not overwhelming sweetness to the scent, while the lavender adds a certain distinction to it, making it more fresh, perhaps?<br />
<br />
I see most votes are saying this is for "fall and winter" but I wore it during the summer a lot and I didn't find it too heavy at all. It's a soft scent with good projection, the longevity is medium. I'll be trying it during the colder months too! I cannot say if this is the most sophisticated, unique fragrance but I enjoy it and that's what matters in the end.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2281720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2281720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281575" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LadyIva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1013003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LadyIva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Portrayal-Woman-54459.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54459.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrayal Woman"title="Portrayal Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); Its not bad, its just that the market is swamped with literally hundreds of similar scents. Vanilla indeed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2281575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2281575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not as clean and complex as Id like. Smells almost exactly like Valentino Donna. Not really anything special. Its generic tbh and not very mature. I like the Libres and Alien Goddesss much better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2281122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2281122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279987" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kittylyra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250143"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2250143.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kittylyra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279987ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279987" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250143">Kittylyra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 02:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unpopular opinion: EXTREMELY lavender at fist whiff but after a couple hour, vanilla starts blending in. I'm a HUGE fan of Burberry but this one really disappointing me. I wonder why no one mentions this but this Goddess reminds me a lot of Burberry Brit EDP. <br />
<br />
so, this perfume is nothing new, not very interesting. it's boring, simple and old-fashioned. I don't recommend this Goddess to someone who loves to be unique.<br />
<br />
longevity: 7/10 (the performance is very low; my bf couldn't smell it after 6 hours - not worth for the price)<br />
silage: 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="83483"comment_id="2279987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html?ccid=2279987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
